评论详情: Nice material fits as expected. Get your actual size don’t listen to the bad review stating it runs small it does not!

I ordered this long-sleeved cropped t-shirt in size S, and it fit perfectly. It's cute, comfortable, and its design with numbers, stars, and stripes print is very eye-catching. Ideal for going out and adding a unique touch to any outfit. If you're looking for a stylish and unique piece, I recommend it. I loved it!

评论概述: Runs small. Cheap, thin fabric with minimal stretch
评论详情: Not flattering as there’s little stretch to it and the shoulders are cut weird. Not true to size. Actually feels like it runs maybe two sizes too small. The fabric is much thinner than I expected. You could see everything through it- bra lines and all. The sleeves are good length I must say. The neckline cut was accurate. Will not ever be wearing this even if it was the right size.

This shirt is fashionable and is made of nice, slightly cooling material. Although, it fits rather odd. It's loose around the shoulders and below the chest. It also rides up a lot, which means it needs adjustment. But other than that, it's a good shirt.
Fits nicely, so cute and easy to pair with any bottoms
Just like the picture. Very flattering. I love the soft material. It's a great shirt. I like it a lot.
